description.value: When the woodblessed dies, the planar portal inside of them collapses, causing them to explode in a @Template[burst|distance:20] of vines that deal @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage per level to all creatures with a @Check[reflex|dc:|basic] save against the woodblessed's spell DC. The woodblessed's body is completely consumed, though their root network and gear remain behind.
